txt.en: 'We should be cautious about the truths discovered here. Most folks cannot understand the terrors that you seem to face with ease. I am in awe of your ability. Come, let us return.'
In the ruins of Dol Ernil, the dead walk again. A sickly glow from within the ruins beckons you to face the foes and drive them out of the ruins.
Defeat the gaunt-men in the Ruins of Dol Ernil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
